milonga.title: Next Bicyclette milonga
milonga.subtitle: Welcome! Our supercharged cycling team is waiting for you at TRAC, a beautiful location in the heart of historical Toulouse, with its oak floor and its outstanding sound system. Guest DJs playing 100% traditional tango, homemade sweet and savory dishes prepared by our chefs, and fun games are part of the program. Price: €10 or €8 if need be.

marathon.title: Registration for marathon
marathon.title_: Registration for the marathon is closed.

marathon.timetable-description: Our cheerful cyclist team is organising the first Bicyclette Marathon in the historical city center of Toulouse. 5 international djs, 27hrs of traditional tango, 150 dancers, 80€. Here is the program:

inner.description: SET JEANNIE LONGO THE FIRST – TDJ Barbara Palmer (Spain)
BIKE WALKS in Toulouse, meet 10:30am in front of the Maison du vélo, 12 Bd Bonrepos.
SET RAYMOND POULIDOR THE ETERNEL SECOND - TDJ Rosita Lagos-Diaz (Lyon)
Aperitif in the Jardin des plantes
SET AGAINST THE WATCH - TDJ Nicolas Arribat (Toulouse)
SET LOUIS AMSTRONG THE DOPED - TDJ Paola Nocitango (Italy)
ALEXANDER TECHNICAL WORKSHOP with Élodie and Maïté, meet 10am in front of Salle Trac, free admission.
SET A SUNDAY BIKE RIDE - TDJ Nicolas Arribat (Toulouse)
SET THE RED LANTERN IN THE PINK CITY - TDJ Carmen Maria Hergos (Mexico)
AFTER - EL ONCE 11 rue Louis Renault, Balma - TDJ Virginia Uva (Entry 6€)

place.title: Toulouse, the pink city!
place.salle: TRAC is a longstanding Rock dance venue in Toulouse. 120m² of oak floorboards, an incredible sound system, a mezzanine on each side, a second room to relax, a bar, two dressing rooms. This exceptional venue is located in the heart of the historical city.
place.jardin: You’ll have the opportunity to enjoy a natural setting, the Jardin des plantes, located steps away from our venue. Ideal for picnics and aperitifs!
place.garonne: The banks of the Garonne are also nearby, and so we couldn’t resist offering you a different perspective of the city through a rowing session on the river, on Saturday morning! Reservation and payment to be made at the time of registration.
place.food: Homemade savory and sweet snacks will be served throughout the weekend. Chef Sergueï will be selecting products from the Occitanie region: cheese, deli meats, fruit, wine, beer, we're spoilt for choice!
